tables.table_title: EXPERIMENTAL RESULTS OF SA, PSO, GA AND DCLA OVER 20 INDEPENDENT RUNS ON 12 INSTANCES IN 5000 itERATIONS. $M_{\text {avg }}, V_{\text {avg }}$. $M_{\text {best }}$ AND RPD indicate the average maKespan, the average variance, the best maKespan and the average relative percentage DEVIATION RESPECTIVELY.
